title: Commission Directive 88/485/EEC of 26 July 1988 amending the Annex to Council Directive 82/471/EEC concerning certain products used in animal nutrition
header:
COMMISSION  DIRECTIVE
of 26 July 1988
amending the Annex to Council Directive 82/471/EEC concerning certain products used in animal nutrition
(88/485/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Annex to Directive 82/471/EEC is amended as set out in the Annex hereto.

The Member States shall bring into force the laws, regulations and administrative provisions necessary to comply with Article 1 not later than 30 June 1989. They shall immediately inform the Commission thereof.
This Directive is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 26 July 1988.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 213, 21. 7. 1982, p. 8.
(2) OJ No L 312, 7. 11. 1986, p. 39.
